title: Crossing the Rhône
summary: Capture the Roman villages across the Rhône to secure your march into Italy
teaching_goal: Introduce bridge assaults and multi-pronged captures with cavalry and medics.
narrative_intent: Hannibal pushes across the Rhône, forcing the Romans off their fortified villages.

victory_conditions.description: Capture both Roman villages across the river

defeat_conditions.description: Do not lose all your units

optional_objectives.description: Complete the crossing within 10 minutes for bonus

actions.text: Use your cavalry to flank the Roman positions along the river!
